justification: "Procedural knowledge was assessed using the Observing Language Pedagogy (OLP) tool, designed to capture the facets of perceiving, naming and interpreting."
construct: procedural knowledge of oral language pedagogy

justification: "Following the VAIL methodology, perceiving was directly prompted: teachers were asked to identify up to 8 strategies reflected in each video ... to generate two perceiving scores."
"All valid responses ... were coded ... to generate two naming ... scores: one for each video."
"All valid responses ... were coded ... to generate two ... interpreting scores: one for each video."

measured_by: Early Childhood Environment Rating Scale – Third Edition (ECERS-3)
justification: "The Early Childhood Environment Rating Scale Third Edition (ECERS-3) comprises 35 items assessing the global education and care environment, including interactions, activities, the physical environment and care routines."
construct: global education and care environment quality

measured_by: Sustained Shared Thinking and Emotional Wellbeing (SSTEW) scale
justification: "The 14 items of the SSTEW assess adult-child interactions supporting children's thinking, language, emotional well-being and self-regulation."
construct: adult-child interaction quality – sustained shared thinking and emotional wellbeing

justification: "The 6 items of the ECERS-E literacy subscale assess support for language and emergent literacy."
construct: support for language and emergent literacy quality

justification: "For the purposes of the current study, an Oral Language Quality score was generated using relevant items from all 3 rating scales."
